title: Keep getting Sion in ARAM
body: I owns lots of other champion, but still, I am getting Sion 3 times in a row or have a very high chances of getting him. I always have to waste one of my rerolls to play someone else. It is like a curse or Sion is soulbind to me. Pls help, I don't to go back and play SF, because I always get swear at for something. I love ARAM, most people are nice and friendly and I love to be there, but this just keeps happening and stopping me from playing it.

replies.body: Some player's curse is another's blessing.  :P  There's no bug, just the luck of the draw.
